text.en: You who were guided and cared for by Mañjughoṣa gurus,
text.en-trans: jamyang lama nam kyi jesu zung

text.en: Treasury of oceanic knowledge of Dharma, profound and vast,
text.en-trans: zabgyé chö tsul gyatso khyenpé ter

text.en: Incomparable in intellect,2a lion of speech—
To you I pray: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: To you I pray: please remain for a hundred aeons!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so kal gyar tso zhé sol
